MemoryInfobox.description: 'Hirpes the Sordid|This mercenary preferred a stealthy approach. He would hide for hours while waiting for his targets. Assigned to patrol Pellene, he knew how to use the town's geography to his advantage.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'
MemoryInfobox.previous: Atos the Beast Caller (memory)|Atos the Beast Caller

General_Description: '''Hirpes the Sordid''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra tracked down [[Hirpes the Sordid]], one of the mercenaries hired by the [[Phila|Tempest]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found the [[mercenary]] in [[Pellene]], attacking him.
*'''Mercenary:''' ''The Tempest demands your head, Eagle Bearer!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''She'll have yours instead.''
Kassandra eliminated Hirpes.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This mercenary was sent by the Tempest. He won't be the last.''
Section_References:
